dict.acceptation: 适应于，适应不同情况（或环境）(to)；

sent.orig: Allow yourself to adapt to the environment, because you never adapt to the environment.
sent.trans: 让自己去适应环境，因为环境永远不会来适应你。

sent.orig: I find it hardto adapt myself to my new school.
sent.trans: 我发现我很难适应新的学校。

sent.orig: The program provides job training for people who otherwise could not adapt attend college.
sent.trans: 这项计划为那些不能上大学的人提供工作培训。

sent.orig: Lacking in awareness, animals have to passively adapt themselves to the living environments.
sent.trans: 动物没有觉性，只能被动地适应生存环境。

sent.orig: Ordinary pre-school education institutions should be able to adapt their lives to receive the disabled child.
sent.trans: 普通幼儿教育机构应当接收能适应其生活的残疾幼儿。
